highlights: Standardization efforts initiated for PRDs and ERDs for the EPSOQ project.
Billing functionality successfully migrated to use checkout sessions.
Agreement reached to redesign the schema page layout and refine dashboard navigation.
Code refactoring planned for the create service and schema modules.
decisions: Shiraz is tasked with finalizing feature-level PRDs for authentication and core services.
The schema page layout must be redesigned, and its navigation bar updated to allow return to the service dashboard.
Sidebar navigation changes must be communicated and promoted across the Zwar and ZFK teams.
next_steps: Osama to present the code-refactoring plan for review.
End-to-end testing is required for all new changes before deployment.
Muhammad to prepare and present a screen-based UX suggestion for email entry.
Matt to research intuitive invite flows, review existing migrations, and coordinate demo messages.

Shiraz.yesterday: Worked on standardizing and drafting initial PRDs/ERDs for EPSOQ.
Shiraz.today: Finalize feature-level PRDs for authentication and services and share updated documents. Inform Zwar and ZFK to promote sidebar navigation changes.

Osama.yesterday: Developed the code-refactoring plan for the create service and schema pages modules.
Osama.today: Present the prepared code-refactoring plan to the team for review.

Usama.today: Apply small tweaks required after the recent code merge.

Muhammad.yesterday: Reviewed UX issues related to email entry and the schema page.
Muhammad.today: Prepare and present a screen-based UX suggestion for email entry. Add a back button and a snack bar notification to the schema page.

Matt.today: Research intuitive invite flows. Review migrations and coordinate necessary demo messages.

tickets_to_create.summary: Finalize feature-level PRDs for Authentication and Service Management (EPSOQ)
tickets_to_create.description: Shiraz to finalize and update the feature-level Product Requirements Documents (PRDs) and Entity Relationship Diagrams (ERDs) for the Authentication and Services components of EPSOQ. These documents should be shared at the next meeting.

tickets_to_create.summary: Communicate sidebar navigation changes to Zwar and ZFK teams
tickets_to_create.description: Shiraz needs to inform Zwar and ZFK teams regarding the new sidebar navigation changes to ensure consistent implementation and promotion across all affected systems.

tickets_to_create.summary: Prepare and Present Code Refactoring Plan (Create Service/Schema Pages)
tickets_to_create.description: Osama to finalize and present the detailed code-refactoring plan focusing on the 'create service' module and the 'schema pages' module to improve maintainability and structure.

tickets_to_create.summary: Redesign Schema Page Layout and Update Navigation
tickets_to_create.description: Redesign the schema page layout to improve user experience and clarity. Update the navigation bar functionality to ensure users can easily return to the primary service dashboard from this page.

tickets_to_create.summary: Define UX screen flow for improved email entry
tickets_to_create.description: Muhammad to develop a screen-based suggestion and flow design to improve the user experience for email entry fields.

tickets_to_create.summary: Implement back button and snack bar on Schema Page
tickets_to_create.description: Implement essential usability components on the Schema Page, including a dedicated back button for easy navigation and a snack bar for user feedback/notifications.

tickets_to_create.summary: Research and document intuitive invite flows UX
tickets_to_create.description: Matt to conduct research into industry best practices for intuitive invite flows and document suggestions for implementation.
